text: Agalatovo (Russian: Агала́тово; Finnish: Ohalatva) is a rural locality (a selo) in Vsevolozhsk District of Leningrad Oblast, Russia. It is the garrison of the 6th Combined Arms Army. == Demographics == ===Population=== As of 2014, the population of Agalatovo was 5155. Администрация МО "Агалатовское сельское поселение" | http://agalatovo.org/index.php/statistic/chislennost- naseleniya/1934-chislennost-naseleniya-i-kolichestvo-khozyajstv- administratsii-mo-agalatovskoe-selskoe-poselenie-na-01-01-2014 ===Ethnicity=== According to the 2002 census, the ethnic composition of Agalatovo was: *Russian - 4034 (79.8%); *Ukrainian - 403 (8.0%); *Belorussians - 141 (2.8%); *Tatar - 68 (1.4%); *Other - 407 (8.1%). == References == Category:Rural localities in Leningrad Oblast
title: Agalatovo
